text: Gwen Stefani is no doubt known for rocking stadiums baring her sassy, strong six - pack. The secret to getting this look is working all 3 areas of your abdominal muscles, and that ’ s exactly what this workout will help you do. Let ’ s get working on sculpting that sexy six - pack! Circuit Works trainer Alycia Darby gives us the run down on achieving a super flat stomach as part of OK!'s 12 Week Countdown To Summer! STAR BODIES! GET BLAKE LIVELY'S LOVELY TONED LEGS Exercise # 1 : Pulsing Straight Leg Bicycles. Lay on your back and bring both feet up 6 inches off the ground. Keeping your legs straight,
